description: A condition where the kneecap dislocates or moves out of its normal position, causing pain and mobility issues.
prevention_minimization: Maintain a healthy weight and avoid activities that could lead to joint injuries. Regular vet check-ups help monitor joint health.

description: A genetic condition where the hip joint does not fit properly into the hip socket, leading to pain and arthritis over time.
prevention_minimization: Choose breeders who perform hip screenings, provide low-impact exercise, and maintain a balanced diet.

description: Unusual sounds heard during a heartbeat, indicating a potential issue with heart function or blood flow.
prevention_minimization: Regular vet check-ups, a heart-healthy diet, and moderate exercise can promote cardiovascular health.

description: Includes cataracts, glaucoma, or retinal diseases that impair vision or cause blindness.
prevention_minimization: Routine eye exams and avoiding trauma or irritants help maintain eye health.

description: A condition where the thyroid gland underproduces hormones, causing lethargy, weight gain, and skin problems.
prevention_minimization: Regular blood tests and monitoring help detect thyroid imbalances early for effective treatment.

description: Clouding of the eye lens, leading to blurred vision and potentially blindness.
prevention_minimization: Protect eyes from injuries and limit UV exposure. Regular check-ups can identify early signs.

description: Adverse reactions to certain environmental factors, foods, or substances causing skin irritations or digestive issues.
prevention_minimization: Use hypoallergenic products, maintain hygiene, and avoid known allergens.

description: Conditions where the immune system attacks the body's own tissues, causing chronic inflammation and organ damage.
prevention_minimization: Minimize stress, avoid excessive vaccinations, and maintain a balanced diet.

description: A degenerative eye disorder leading to gradual vision loss and blindness.
prevention_minimization: Select breeders who screen for PRA and maintain annual eye exams.

description: A life-threatening condition where the stomach fills with gas and twists, restricting blood flow.
prevention_minimization: Feed smaller meals, avoid exercise after meals, and use slow-feeder bowls.

description: A joint condition involving abnormal development of the elbow, leading to pain, lameness, and arthritis.
prevention_minimization: Provide joint-supporting nutrients, low-impact exercise, and maintain regular vet check-ups.

description: Problems like dermatitis or parasitic infestations that affect the skinâ€™s health and appearance.
prevention_minimization: Regular grooming and parasite prevention, along with quality diet and hygiene practices.

description: Inflammation and infection in the ear canal, common in breeds with floppy ears or prone to allergies.
prevention_minimization: Regular ear cleaning, keeping ears dry, and monitoring for signs of infection.

description: Partial or complete loss of hearing, either congenital or acquired.
prevention_minimization: Prevent ear infections, protect ears from loud noises, and ensure regular ear checks.

description: Excess body fat that can contribute to joint problems, heart disease, and decreased lifespan.
prevention_minimization: Maintain a balanced diet, avoid overfeeding, and ensure regular exercise.

description: A neurological disorder characterized by recurring seizures.
prevention_minimization: Although genetic, reducing stress and following vet-recommended treatment can help manage symptoms.

description: Includes tooth decay, gum disease, and tartar buildup leading to pain and tooth loss.
prevention_minimization: Regular tooth brushing, dental chews, and annual dental vet visits.

description: Cardiovascular conditions impairing heart function, such as valve defects and cardiomyopathy.
prevention_minimization: Feed a heart-friendly diet, maintain a healthy weight, and follow vet recommendations.

description: Infestations by parasites like fleas, ticks, or worms causing various health issues.
prevention_minimization: Use regular parasite preventatives, practice hygiene, and check for parasites frequently.

description: A congenital eye condition causing vision impairment or blindness.
prevention_minimization: Select breeders that screen for this condition and regular eye exams.

description: A rare kidney disorder affecting reabsorption, leading to excessive urination and dehydration.
prevention_minimization: Avoid toxins and maintain regular vet check-ups to detect early signs.

description: Problems affecting kidney function, causing increased thirst and urination or severe kidney failure.
prevention_minimization: Ensure hydration, feed a kidney-friendly diet, and conduct regular vet visits.

description: Partial or complete inability to hear, which may be congenital or acquired.
prevention_minimization: Protect ears from infections and trauma, and monitor ear health.

description: Degeneration of the femoral head, leading to joint pain and lameness.
prevention_minimization: Choose breeders who test for it, and maintain moderate activity to avoid stress on joints.

description: Imbalances in thyroid hormone production affecting metabolism and energy levels.
prevention_minimization: Regular vet checks and prompt treatment help manage thyroid health.

description: Condition where spinal discs rupture or bulge, causing pain or paralysis.
prevention_minimization: Avoid activities that strain the spine, and maintain healthy body weight.

description: Various types of malignant growths affecting different organs or tissues.
prevention_minimization: Regular vet check-ups and minimizing exposure to known carcinogens.

description: Specific cancers more common in some breeds, such as lymphoma and bone cancer.
prevention_minimization: Early detection through routine vet exams and health monitoring.

description: A hereditary bleeding disorder preventing proper blood clotting.
prevention_minimization: Choose breeders who screen for the condition, and avoid activities that may cause injuries.

description: Problems such as arthritis or dysplasia causing pain and reduced mobility.
prevention_minimization: Maintain a healthy weight, provide joint supplements, and moderate activity.

description: Includes dermatitis, mange, and eczema, causing itching and redness.
prevention_minimization: Regular grooming, high-quality diet, and immediate treatment of irritants or infections.

description: A heart condition where the mitral valve deteriorates, impacting blood flow.
prevention_minimization: A diet low in sodium, regular vet check-ups, and proper exercise.

description: Various heart-related problems such as congenital defects or cardiomyopathy.
prevention_minimization: Maintain a healthy weight, provide a balanced diet, and conduct regular check-ups.

description: Seen in flat-faced breeds, causing breathing difficulties due to narrow airways.
prevention_minimization: Maintain healthy weight, avoid excessive heat and exercise, and use harnesses instead of collars.
